channel.title: Help please.... error
channel.description: Please help with this, i'm not understand I know its anti leech but not sure what im looking for to uncomment.

item.title: Help please.... error
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:547813”][quote author=tank nation link=topic=666720.msg4458028#msg4458028 date=1416018525]
so basically the ones with stars ** around them / beside them per say just delete out of client.java and such? Man idk… I just keep getting errors I give up just was asking for some help I don’t understand what im taking out as I never done this before.
[/quote]
I’ve already linked you to two different articles on comments in Java…[/quote]

oh really sorry didn’t see it man, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please.... error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’m sorry, but I’m not helping with an anti-leech…
Espcially since A) he told you how to remove it and B) It’s by far the easiest anti-leech I’ve seen…
All you do is

[code=java]/* Find some commented code
*

  • And remove the comments
    */ [/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help please.... error
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Okay I found out how to comment some things out for the server part cause of the anti leech the guy had put in there now, I’m not sure what he means by the client part i’m not sure what im deleting/taking out everytime I do it gives errors. please help me with this part ill be done a good to go ill show you what he said to take out and a pic of my stuff that I need.

Now in client.java
Uncomment out the client() in Client.java
Uncomment out the findcachedir() in signlink.java
Uncomment out the String cacheLink in CacheDownloader.java

Read full topic

item.title: Help please.... error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tank nation, post:5, topic:547813”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666720.msg4457804#msg4457804 date=1415908723]

import signlink or change it to
sign.signlink

(for all instances of findcachedir)

Not sure where all the comments need removed at but if you could do real quick for me that would be awesome i’m not sure what im removing I just don’t want to mess anything up. Its a great client.

BUMP: Still need help please!!

Nope. Point of the help sections is for us to help you. I’m not going to do everything for you.

They’re not comments either.
My instructions are basic, they’re straight forward. You can do it.
[/quote]

Okay good point, what exactly am I changing to sign.signlink inside of the folder? or folder its self[/quote]
Nothing.
You’re changing the instances of “signlink” you see on the compiler there to “sign.signlink”

Read full topic
